price: E, assim, cumpri o peso com equidade, e não defraudeis na balança.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-wazna bil-qis'ṭi walā tukh'sirū al-mīzāna
